name: Animal Feeder
description:
This is a prototype and for educational uses. You can take and check out assets from there: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/tutorials/create-with-code-proto...

Source code and game is given below. You can check out my GitHub too.

Github -> https://github.com/tugcantopaloglu/animal-feeder

INSTRUCTIONS

Right and Left Arrow Keys -> Movement

Space -> Fire
